act1.title: Act 1.
act1.description: It all started in 2006, in the heart of starlight night, when two man record a demo tape called "Return to Death" - a raw narrative using a crude drum machine, but filled with the sincerity of the participants. The demo distributed among a close circle of people involved in the black metal underground.

act2.title: Act 2.
act2.description: EP "Seeds ov Hell" was created in 2008, but found its physical embodiment in 2011 by the forces of the Belarus label "Aeon of Horus" of the "Niemarač Clan". A succinct statement with the trends of the French black metal scene, consisting of three main compositions.

act3.title: Act 3.
act3.stanza: "You came into the world to burn in the Sun of Fortress and the stronger evil the brighter the Flame of Pure Hearts"
act3.description: The first LP "To the Sun" of 2013 marked the beginning of the collaboration with the music label "Thou Shalt Kill!". The acquisition of his own emphasize on this album already takes place. From now on, the compositions are performed in Russian.

act4.title: Act 4.
act4.stanza: "By Spirit and Blood, with Flame in the Heart"
act4.description: The most musically experimental LP "To the Dust" is the next stage of the band‘s development. The album saw the light in 2015. Stylistically this act is an intertwining of dark rock, doom and black metal. A dark horse in our discography.

act5.title: Act 5.
act5.stanza:
"Smoke of black souls, flame of vermilion tongues.
Temples are filling with ashes of the burning hearts.
Scars-pathways lead beyond heavenly threshold
The breed of another ones doomed to wanderings..."
act5.description: LP "Another Ones" 2017 returns the musical compositions to the canvas of black metal. Composed in a unified style, the compositions are saturated with new techniques without losing the developments of former accomplishments.

act6.title: Act 6.
act6.stanza: "A song is a fire that is dangerous to joke with. Song is not a game, but a sacred act. Let in this songs chaos, the cry of a lonely soul, the boiling of dark forces - let them! For the breath of God is not in silence, but in storms."
act6.description: The religious album "Anabasis ov Spirit", consisting of seven proclamations, is the quintessence of the creators inner torments. Released in 2020 by the label "Thou Shalt Kill!", it is currently the most personal act among the other works.

act7.title: Act 7.
act7.stanza: "By Blood Magic crush false idols in True Greatness!"
act7.description: In 2022 was released "Blood Magic". For the first time, keyboard instruments were used in the recording to give the compositions extra atmosphere. With the latest album, Plamen marks the 15th anniversary of the band‘s existence.

KingPreview.title: Two years after the release of the album "Blood Magic", we are proud to announce our new creation — "King ov Life and Death"...
